Articles.Content:
Hello Everyone,

ive been playing the Ksp demo for a couple of months, and have deceided that given the hours of fun ive had with it i better go buy it and give Squad my money. i should be throwing about 30 at them i bought the game on steam.

i have managed to get a few satelitte thingys into orbit my dream is a massive space station that circles kerbin! kinda like you see in the starship troopers movie.

So yeah lets get some nice discussions going
Welcome to the forum! Do not be afraid to ask questions or anything here.
Welcome to the forum! Good luck building a massive space station, it will however melt your computer.

Welcome to the forums!

That station sounds like a pretty ambitious goal. Don't forget to practice your docking before trying to build anything crazy, though! There's a few docking tutorials over in the Drawing Board (link in my sig) along with guides and references for tons of other subjects, and if you still have questions, the folks in the "How To" section are generally more than willing to share their accumulated wisdom.

Once you've gotten it built, feel free to show it off!

Happy landings!
Thanks very much, ill look into all the stuff and let you know how i progress, and new patch soon sounds pretty good
